channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 科罗拉多矿业大学在六个月内第二次求助于市政市场，以解决其位于丹佛郊外、拥有约 7000 名学生的校园住房短缺问题。
item.description:
The Colorado School of Mines is turning to the muni market for the second time in six months to address a housing shortage for its growing campus of roughly 7,000 students just outside of Denver. https://t.co/yP3iGbjLUF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 南非政府因未能就南非国旗航空公司的合理价值达成一致意见而终止了出售该公司的交易
item.description:
South Africa’s government terminated a deal to sell its flag carrier after failing to agree on a fair value for the airline https://t.co/xBPbvP3Gwb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲投资银行表示将寻求更多机会投资于非洲气候相关项目
item.description:
The European Investment Bank said its seeking more opportunities to invest in African climate-related projects https://t.co/qdjLfFhaWZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）将在悉尼发表演讲，称即使商品出口价格疲软和失业率上升抑制了收入增长，澳大利亚仍将努力实现连续第二次预算盈余。
item.description:
Australia is pressing for a second consecutive budget surplus even as weakening commodity export prices and rising unemployment crimp revenue gains, Treasurer Jim Chalmers will say in a speech in Sydney https://t.co/gi6m0MpeKs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）吹嘘自己管理经济的得票策略在 6 月的欧盟大选中行不通。
item.description:
Emmanuel Macron’s vote-winning strategy of vaunting his management of the economy won’t work for June’s EU elections, according to Bloomberg Economics research that shows misery raining down on the French https://t.co/3pkN3zSR3h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 南非将在本月底向约 60 个加密货币平台发放许可证，成为非洲大陆首批要求数字资产交易所获得运营许可证的国家之一。
item.description:
South Africa will license about 60 cryptocurrency platforms by the end of the month, placing it among the first nations on the continent to oblige digital-asset exchanges to have permits to operate https://t.co/9eHif6kUHL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 以太坊完成了一次重大软件升级，这将使区块链网络生态系统的使用成本更低。
item.description:
Ethereum completed a major software upgrade that should make using the blockchain network ecosystem cheaper. https://t.co/w6gkeSSfwH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥中央银行一位副行长认为，在 3 月 21 日下次会议之前，墨西哥中央银行的参考利率仍有调整空间
item.description:
A Banxico deputy governor sees room to adjust the Mexican central bank’s reference rate ahead of its next meeting on March 21 https://t.co/RZ7l2GUJZd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 中国已承诺由中央政府出资，鼓励消费者和企业更换旧设备和商品，这是其今年实现约 5%经济增长计划的支柱之一
item.description:
China has pledged central government funds to encourage consumers and businesses to replace old equipment and goods, a pillar of its plan for economic growth of about 5% this year https://t.co/qNut1ofPzx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 瑞士证券交易所 SIX 报告亏损，因其西班牙分部和法国支付公司 Worldline 所持股份减值 14 亿美元
item.description:
Swiss stock exchange SIX reports a loss after taking impairments of $1.4 billion related to its Spanish unit and its stake in Worldline, the French payments company https://t.co/g8wZgIDQVL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国国会民主党人在周四的关键投票前向美国进出口银行领导人发出最后呼吁，警告该机构为巴林石油钻探提供担保的计划将削弱全球应对气候变化的努力。
item.description:
Congressional Democrats are making a last-ditch appeal to leaders of the US Export-Import Bank before a critical vote Thursday, warning the agency its plan to underwrite oil drilling in Bahrain would undercut global efforts to fight climate change. https://t.co/mA1HkaNc2j

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯表示，在获得 130 亿美元的私人投资以支持其成为旅游中心之后，它将能够增加大量新的酒店客房。
item.description:
Saudi Arabia says it'll be able to add a wealth of new hotel rooms after getting $13 billion in private investment to support its push to become a tourism hub. https://t.co/dChTYmSZQz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 得益于股市的持续上涨和整个大宗商品市场的大幅波动，华尔街的 "趋势追踪 "专家们又开始了自2008年以来的最佳开局。
item.description:
Trend-following quants are rallying back on Wall Street for their best start to a year since 2008, thanks to relentless stock market gains and sharp moves across the commodity complex. https://t.co/vnpLApbnt6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 比尔-杜德利称，美联储可能需要在经济增长更热的情况下维持更高利率
item.description:
Fed may need to keep rates higher in a hotter-growth world, Bill Dudley says https://t.co/oainMVXHq9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 现在，农作物巨头 ADM 在营养方面的大赌注已经磕磕绊绊，农产品贸易周期已经转向，它将何去何从？
item.description:
Where does crop giant ADM go from here, now that its big bet on nutrition has stumbled and the agricultural trading cycle has turned? https://t.co/midXKRUe4f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 随着 NFT 在最近的加密货币复兴浪潮中卷土重来，Hivemind Capital 正在寻求为新基金筹集至少 5000 万美元。
item.description:
With NFTs attempting a comeback amid the latest crypto renaissance, Hivemind Capital is seeking to raise at least $50 million for a new fund. https://t.co/GTsP1JaX2C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 土耳其今年第二次利用近期评级上调、对高风险债务的高需求以及对政府经济管理信心的增强，在国际债券市场上大展拳脚。
item.description:
Turkey tapped international bond markets for the second time this year, capitalizing on a recent ratings upgrade, high demand for riskier debt and increasing confidence in the government’s management of the economy. https://t.co/3NkZIIlWzg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 危机四伏的玻利维亚债券反弹令华尔街大惑不解
item.description:
Bond Rally in Crisis-Ridden Bolivia Is Baffling Wall Street https://t.co/1kT5sbWd71

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 基金经理巴里-诺里斯（Barry Norris）认为，对利润的高度关注是美国公司取得如此辉煌业绩的超能力。利率上升是否会给其他更容易分心的公司带来追赶的压力？
item.description:
Fund manager Barry Norris argues that a laser focus on profits is the superpower that has enabled US companies to outperform so handsomely. Will rising interest rates put pressure on other, more easily distracted firms to catch up? https://t.co/2KjSEOZd2c

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 拉丁美洲最大的资产管理公司 Vinci Partners 正在寻求收购私人信贷公司，以扩大全球业务规模。
item.description:
Vinci Partners., the largest asset manager in Latin America, is looking to acquire private-credit firms to gain scale in a business that’s expanding globally. https://t.co/l2LI4tvwb8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 本周三，华尔街对特斯拉的态度进一步恶化，因为又有一位分析师警告特斯拉的销售面临风险，并称其降价提振需求的策略正在失去效用。
item.description:
Wall Street’s stance on Tesla worsened further on Wednesday as yet another analyst warned about risks to sales, and said its strategy of cutting prices to boost demand was losing its effectiveness. https://t.co/GlGJf3FNO8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙最大的私营部门雇主希望葡萄牙各政党在可能产生少数派政府的选举后确保稳定并就关键改革达成一致意见
item.description:
Portugal’s biggest private-sector employer wants the nation’s political parties to ensure stability and agree on key reforms following an election that’s likely to result in a minority government https://t.co/kdA1ko85Cy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲投资银行正在考虑如何扩大对国防工业的支持，此举将有助于欧盟加强安全，应对来自俄罗斯日益增长的威胁
item.description:
The European Investment Bank is considering ways to expand its support for the defense industry, in a move that would help the EU bolster its security in response to the growing threat from Russia https://t.co/lvHHNYGOTk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行就如何实施货币政策提出了一个新框架，保留了现行的利率指导体系，同时在贷款人需要多少现金来运营的问题上给予他们更多的发言权
item.description:
The ECB presents a new framework for how it implements monetary policy, preserving the current system of steering interest rates while giving lenders more of a say over how much cash they need to operate https://t.co/LVbsSPsWej

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 去年年底，全球债券和股票的反弹支撑了加拿大人的财富，抵消了房地产价值的持续下降
item.description:
A global rally in bonds and equities supported Canadians' wealth at the end of last year, offsetting continued declines in real estate values https://t.co/Ux04qjZKuC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 不到一年前，投资者还在猜测数十亿美元的债券到期后会发生什么。现在，企业急于向繁荣的市场出售债务
item.description:
Less than a year ago, investors were gaming out what would happen when billions of dollars of bonds reached maturity dates. Now, companies rushing to sell debt to a buoyant market https://t.co/4bY3VpGUgj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 丹麦将为国防增资 60 亿美元，并开始征召女性入伍

Denmark to Add $6 Billion to Defense, Start Drafting Women https://t.co/tn4Oihpfpb

item.title: 比特币在六天内第四次创下历史新高，与加密货币挂钩的美国交易所交易基金破纪录的资金流入为其提供了支撑。
item.description:
Bitcoin hit a fresh record high for the fourth time in six days, bolstered by record-breaking inflows into US exchange-traded funds tied to the cryptocurrency. https://t.co/pTTVm4aU2W

item.title: 股市收盘再创新高，接下来会怎样？通过 Bloomberg Surveillance 获取每日市场、金融和投资信息。加入 @TomKeene @dsassower @LisaMateoTV @BigBarrSports 在 YouTube 上的直播。在此观看：
item.description:
After another record close for stocks, what comes next?
Get your daily dose of markets, finance and investment on Bloomberg Surveillance.

Watch here: https://t.co/u7A6Vt0vDR

— Bloomberg Radio (@BloombergRadio) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在美国质疑高等教育价值的时候，FAFSA 的推出却让准大学生们感到沮丧
item.description:
The messy FAFSA rollout is frustrating prospective college students at a time when the country is questioning the value of higher education https://t.co/pOKmSitJlv
